name: df-chj
body: |- wceq(chj, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(chba), cpw(chba), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
comment: Define Hilbert lattice join. See ~ chjval for its value and ~ chjcl for its closure law. Note that we define it over all Hilbert space subsets to allow proving more general theorems. Even for general subsets the join belongs to ` CH ` ; see ~ sshjcl . (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
